
snap(20,5,-35)

sky(201,218,255)
fog(240,211,211)
ground(196,192,183)
polys(194,187,175)

fadefrom(5000)
density(5)

name(King's Revenge)
nlaps(4)


set(15,0,0,0)p
set(15,0,5600,0)p
set(35,-500,7600,0)pr
set(35,500,11600,0)pr
set(15,0,11200,0)p
set(15,0,16800,0)p
set(15,0,22400,0)p
set(15,0,28000,0)p
chk(42,0,28550,0)
set(17,0,32550,-90)pt
set(15,-4550,32550,90)p
set(33,-6050,32550,90)
set(15,-10150,32550,90)p
set(33,-10150,32550,90)
set(15,-15750,32550,90)p
set(33,-15750,32550,90)
set(15,-21350,32550,90)p
chk(42,-23000,32550,90)
set(17,-25900,32550,0)pt
set(15,-25900,28000,0)po
set(15,-25900,22400,0)p
set(34,-25900,20400,0)pr
fix(41,-25900,17400,-1900,0)s
set(15,-25900,16800,0)p
set(15,-25900,11200,0)p
set(15,-25900,5600,0)p
chk(42,-25900,3600,0)
set(17,-25900,1050,90)pt
set(15,-21350,1050,90)p
set(20,-15800,1050,-90)p
set(10,-11200,1050,-90)p
set(14,-6650,1050,180)pt
chk(40,-6650,3000,0)
set(10,-6650,5600,0)p
set(13,-8170,11200,30)p
set(10,-9690,16800,0)p
chk(40,-9690,14800,0)
set(10,-9690,22400,0)p
set(26,-9690,22400,0)p
set(23,-9690,24200,180)p

set(24,-9690,35350,180)p
set(15,-9690,38150,0)p
set(17,-9690,42700,-90)pt
set(15,-14240,42700,90)p
chk(42,-14240,42700,90)
set(17,-18790,42700,0)pt
set(15,-18790,38150,0)p
set(33,-18790,36350,0)
set(24,-18790,35350,180)p


set(23,-18790,24200,180)p
set(10,-18790,22400,0)p
set(32,-19290,22400,180)
set(32,-18290,20400,180)
set(10,-18790,16800,0)p
set(13,-17270,11200,30)p
set(14,-15750,6650,180)pt
chk(40,-17500,6650,90)
set(14,-19250,6650,90)pt
set(13,-20770,11200,30)p
set(10,-22290,16800,0)p
set(10,-22290,22400,0)p
chk(40,-22290,23400,0)
set(14,-22290,26950,0)pt
set(10,-17740,26950,90)p
set(10,-12140,26950,90)p
set(26,-12140,26950,-90)p
set(23,-10340,26950,90)p

set(23,3500,29800,180)p
set(10,3500,28000,0)p
chk(40,3000,28000,90)
set(10,3500,22400,0)p
set(10,3500,16800,0)p
set(20,3500,11200,0)p
set(15,3500,5600,0)p
set(15,3500,0,0)p
chk(42,3500,-1000,0)
set(17,3500,-4550,180)pt
set(17,0,-4550,90)pt

set(36,5310,28000,-90)
set(36,5310,27000,-90)
set(36,5310,26000,-90)

set(24,-23150,-2050,90)
set(15,-21350,-2050,90)
set(15,-15800,-2050,90)
set(15,-11200,-2050,90)
set(24,-9400,-2050,-90)


maxr(11,7000,-5100)
maxb(8,-7500,-29000)
maxl(11,-31400,-5100)
maxt(8,45300,-29000)
